### Infrastructure

- stor-b-04: CPU 76% | Mem 79% | Disk Used 97% | Disk Busy 95% | Conns: N/A | Net: In 8.1 Gbps / Out 7.4 Gbps

- pool-1: active 120 | idle 30 | waiting 5 | exhaustion: 2 | max: 150 | avg_wait: 12ms
- pool-2: active 85 | idle 20 | waiting 3 | exhaustion: 1 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 8ms
- pool-3: active 60 | idle 15 | waiting 2 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 80 | avg_wait: 10ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 87.5% | Bandwidth: 2.5 Gbps | Origin requests: 12,000

### Alerts
- [SEVERE] quota_hard_blocks on hostname: 6
- [WARNING] storage_disk_busy on stor-a-16: 99%
- [CRITICAL] scrub_errors on storage: 44
- [WARNING] metadata_manifest_backlog: 6100
- [SEVERE] storage_capacity_utilization: 89.1%
- [WARNING] node_utilization_max: 98.8%
- [WARNING] nodes_over_80pct: 84
- [CRITICAL] nodes_over_90pct: 35

### Deployments & Changes
- No deployments or changes today.

### Events
- Another heavy ingest day (+238 TB) pushed overall utilization above 89% and drove quota hard blocks to 6; enforced immediate freeze on new tenant onboarding.
- Compaction pending jumped to 130 with disk busy p95 94.6%; scheduled extended overnight compaction and reduced rebalance bandwidth during peak.
- Scrub errors rose to 44; identified top churn namespaces and requested workload changes (lower TTL churn, batch deletes) to reduce tombstone load.
- Metadata manifest backlog climbed to 6.1k; temporarily disabled non-critical namespace inventory jobs and increased metadata write buffers.

### On-Call
- Shift: Nisha P. 12 pages. 21 tickets. Status: Degraded; capacity constraints and high churn workloads are stressing compaction/scrubs and triggering quotas. Mitigations: onboarding freeze, workload adjustments, overnight compaction, metadata job deferrals.
